actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing.

official_title: A bill to prohibit banks and certain other financial institutions from maintaining any account (including a numbered account) which conceals the identity of the owner of the account.

summary.text: Prohibits National banks, State banks which are members of the Federal Reserve System and banks insured by the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation from maintaining any account (including a numbered account) which conceals the identity of the owner of the account.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit banks and certain other financial institutions from maintaining any account (including a numbered account) which conceals the identity of the owner of the account.
